member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the current application builder.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.ApplicationBuilder.RegisterModule(Kentico.Web.Mvc.IModule)
member.summary: Registers a request pipeline module that provides Kentico ASP.NET MVC integration features.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.ApplicationBuilder.Build(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Builds the request pipeline from registered modules that provide Kentico ASP.NET MVC integration features.
member.param: The ASP.NET application that defines common methods, properties, and events.

member.name: T:Kentico.Web.Mvc.ApplicationBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods related to Kentico ASP.NET MVC integration features.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.ApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseDataAnnotationsLocalization(Kentico.Web.Mvc.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Enables localization of ASP.NET model meta-data based on data annotation attributes. Display names or validation results declared with data annotation attributes can contain keys of Kentico resource strings that will be resolved automatically using Kentico localization API. The localization uses a custom model metadata provider based on data annotations and is therefore not compatible with other providers or their customizations.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.ApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseNotFoundHandler(Kentico.Web.Mvc.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Displays the ~/Views/Shared/NotFound.cshtml view when a controller is not found, an action is not found, or the action returns the view result.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.ApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseResourceSharingWithAdministration(Kentico.Web.Mvc.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: When request is sent from administration domain of the site, adds header Access-Control-Allow-Origin into response to enable cross origin resource sharing (CORS) with the administration.

member.name: T:Kentico.Web.Mvc.ApplicationHttpModule
member.summary: Provides Kentico ASP.NET MVC integration.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.ApplicationHttpModule.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources used by a module.

member.summary: Initializes a module and prepares it to handle requests.

member.name: T:Kentico.Web.Mvc.CrossOriginResourceSharingWithCurrentSiteModule
member.summary: Module enabling cross origin resource sharing (CORS) with domains bound to current site. When request is sent from current site's domain, adds Access-Control-Allow-Origin header into response to enable CORS.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.CrossOriginResourceSharingWithCurrentSiteModule.Initialize(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Initializes a module and prepares it to handle requests.
member.param: The ASP.NET application that defines common methods, properties, and events.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.CrossOriginResourceSharingWithCurrentSiteModule.SetHeaderToAllowCurrentSiteOrigin(System.Web.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: Sets response header Access-Control-Allow-Origin if request Origin is current site

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.CrossOriginResourceSharingWithCurrentSiteModule.IsCurrentSiteOrigin(System.String)
member.summary: Finds out if the (URI) belongs to current site's administration so the request origin can be considered as trusted.
member.returns: True, if the requestHeaders origin domain is one of current site's domains

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.CrossOriginResourceSharingWithCurrentSiteModule.SetAccessControlAllowOriginHeader(System.Web.HttpResponseBase,System.String)
member.summary: If the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header is not present, it is added and set to given . In case the header is already set, it is replaced by given .
member.param: Response where the header will be set
Origin URI as the value of the header
member.remarks: Adding another origin when the header is already set will not work, browsers won't accept the response. Having allowed origin different than request origin is useless. Therefore is in that case the header value replaced by

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.IVirtualContextUrlProcessor.ValidateAndInitializeVirtualContext(System.Web.HttpContextBase,System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Validates values obtained from URL and on success saves them into . Method is invoked after parsing URL containing and collection containing values parsed from the URL is passed to this method.
member.param: Context in which the request is being handled. Can serve for redirecting the request after unsuccessful validation.
Relative path of the request, stripped off the part containing data.
Collection containing values parsed from the Url address.
member.returns: Returns true if processor validated and on success saved the data from URL, otherwise false. In case processor handled the data from URL, other processors registered in will not have their method invoked.

member.name: M:Kentico.Web.Mvc.IVirtualContextUrlProcessor.PostVirtualContextInitialization(System.Web.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: Method is invoked after initializing via .
member.remarks: Method is invoked even if different handled the URL via . Method is not invoked if redirected the request or threw an exception.
member.param: Context in which the request is being handled.
